column5: I've got a problem.  My wife is going camping for her annual girls weekend.  I want to make sure it is not during the Goose or Duck opener, so need to find those dates out asap.  Anyone know where or when the seasons are posted for the 2014 season?  One year I was trapped at home with the kids as the sky lit up first thing in the morning.  That sucked, hope to avoid it.  Thanks, Entropy
Last saturday in sept, and the early goose is usually the thursday after labour day.  They wont officially be posted by CWS until Aug. 1, but you can pretty much count on those dates.  S.
